law.text: The members of the State Fair Board shall be allowed their necessary traveling and hotel expenses, and shall be allowed one hundred dollars ($100) per day for attending the meetings of the State Fair Board, which shall not exceed ninety-six (96) in number in any one (1) year, and for services rendered in carrying on the State Fair.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 28, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618i-3.
